Sale!

Intro to Data Science: R, Visualization, Classification, Clustering, Regression

$699.00 $499.00

We’ll show you how to analyze data quickly and easily using the same methods professional data scientists use. And we’ll teach you in language you already understand.

In just 24 hours over 4 weeks, you’ll build a toolkit using R, a free open source programming language. You’ll learn about visualizations, classification, regression analysis, clustering, and more.

No prior programming experience required.

  • Description

Product Description

Early bird discount ends December 19, 2014!

We’ll show you how to analyze data quickly and easily using the same methods professional data scientists use. And we’ll teach you in language you already understand. The good news is you have the most important ingredient you’ll need: expertise in your field.

You know your business best. That’s why you should be the one working with your data. In just 4 weeks, you’ll build a toolkit using R, a free open source programming language. When you’re done, you’ll be able to ask questions and pose problems like a data scientist. You’ll have the tools to implement, execute, and explain your predictive models and algorithms. And you’ll be able to create beautiful visualizations to share your insights with others.

This course covers the following topics in an accessible, engaging way:

  • Structuring data problems
  • Thinking like a data scientist
  • A primer on programming and visualizations
  • k-Nearest Neighbors
  • Naive Bayes
  • Logistic regression
  • Decision trees
  • Random forests
  • K-means
  • Hierarchical clustering
  • Simple linear regression
  • Functional regression
  • Multivariate regression
  • Locally weighted scatterplot smoothing (LOWESS)

 

Syllabus is subject to change.

No prior programming experience required.
